<title level="1" pfs="Standard">[Skeletal Horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=374)</title>

<row gap="medium">

<column gap="medium" flex="1 1 400px">

Skeletal horses are sometimes used as mounts by other undead or monsters.

<column gap="tiny">
**[Recall Knowledge - Undead](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**
([Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13)): DC 16

**[Unspecific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 14

**[Specific Lore](/Rules.aspx?ID=563)**: DC 11
</column>

</column>

<column gap="medium">
<image src="/images/Monsters/Skeleton_SkeletalHorse.png" />
</column>

</row>

<title level="2" right="Creature 2">[Skeletal Horse](/Monsters.aspx?ID=374)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="NE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Large" />
<trait label="Mindless" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=108" />
<trait label="Skeleton" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=236" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Bestiary](/Sources.aspx?ID=2) pg. 299</row>

**Perception** +8; darkvision

**Languages**

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +7, [Athletics](/Skills.aspx?ID=3) +9

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +5

**Dex** +3

**Con** +2

**Int** -5

**Wis** +2

**Cha** +0
</row>

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 16 

**Fort** +6 

**Ref** +9 

**Will** +8 

</row>

**HP** 33
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
death effects, disease, mental, paralyzed, poison, unconscious

**Resistances**
cold 5, electricity 5, fire 5, piercing 5, slashing 5

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 40 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
hoof +9,
**Damage** 1d8+5 bludgeoning

**Gallop** <actions string="Two Actions" />  The horse Strides twice, with its Speed increased by 10 feet.

**Undead Steed**   Undead and creatures allied with them can Command a skeletal steed without needing to attempt a skill check.

</column>
